strings.Value: "Forgive me, my friends... but today I will not be able to entertain you with song and story... I'm going to need to lie down."
"I don't... feel well... forgive me, friends... today you'll have to while away the evening without me."
How sad! I will pray to Sarenrae for your quick recovery. But don't linger — go, lie down. You need rest..."
"No, don't worry! Rest as much as you need!"
[Mumbles, putting his hands together]"…blessed be the silence we are granted by night…"
"Praised be Urgathoa, a few hours of peace..."
"Go. Will be ok without you. Yes. Without Linzee. Hm. But come back later. Nok-Nok needs someone to laugh at."
"Lie down and close your eyes. Would you like to hear a Kelish tale? You definitely haven't heard it before!"
